roleset.name: to terminate

example.name: abort-v: transitive
example.text: Thus , a woman who used RU to have an abortion would have to make three trips to the clinic past those picket lines ; an initial visit for medical screening ( anemics and those with previous pregnancy problems are eliminated ) and to take the pill , a second trip 48 hours later for the prostaglandin , administered either via injection or vaginal suppository , and a third trip a week later to make sure she has completely aborted .

example.name: abortion-n: Plan aborted
example.text: There was an abortion of the air strike because of a big sandstorm .

example.name: abortion-n: With extent
example.text: They argued over the ban on partial abortions .

example.name: have_abortion-l: All arguments
example.text: One woman tearfully described having her abortion of a fetus with a chromosomal disorder .

propbank.arg: of a fetus with a chromosomal disorder

roleset.note: ABORT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'abort' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from abort.01-v predicate notes) No VN Class.
ABORTION-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry abort.01, OntoNotes sense groupings 1, 2, 3; no mapping to VerbNet. Framed by Claire (from abortion.01-n)
